title: Knife River Indian Villages National Historic Site: Be A Junior Ranger
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Kids & Youth     Be A Junior Ranger              Be A Junior Ranger         Jr. Ranger badges are awarded to participants that complete the Jr. Ranger booklet.   The Knife River Indian Villages National Historic Site Junior Ranger program provides participants with exploration into the cultural and historic aspects of the Mandan and Hidatsa people during their 500 years of occupation at the confluence of the Knife and Missouri rivers sites.  Â    Click here to download the Junior Ranger book. (pdf, 3.46 MB)
